attribute.name: href
attribute.description: Specifies the target URL

element.name: area
element.description: Defines an area inside an image map

element.name: aside
element.description: Defines content aside from the page content

element.name: base
element.description: Defines a base URL for all the links in a page

element.name: bdo
element.description: Defines the direction of text display

element.name: div
element.description: Defines a section in a document

element.name: embed
element.description: Defines external interactive content or plugin

element.name: eventsource
element.description: Defines a target for events sent by a server

element.name: figure
element.description: Defines a group of media content, and their caption

element.name: footer
element.description: Defines a footer for a section or page

element.name: header
element.description: Defines a header for a section or page

attribute.name: alt
attribute.description: Specifies alternative text format to be displayed when the image is not available

element.name: label
element.description: Defines a label for a form control

element.name: legend
element.description: Defines a title in a fieldset

element.name: meter
element.description: Defines measurement within a predefined range

element.name: nest
element.description: Defines a nestingpoint in a datatemplate

element.name: option
element.description: Defines an option in a drop-down list

element.name: param
element.description: Defines a parameter for an object

element.name: progress
element.description: Defines progress of a task of any kind

element.name: rule
element.description: Defines the rules for updating a template

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: Specifies the type of the script

element.name: span
element.description: Defines a section in a document

attribute.name: class
attribute.description: Specifies a classname for an element (used to specify a class in a style sheet)

attribute.name: contenteditable
attribute.description: Specifies whether or not a user is allowed to edit the content

attribute.name: contextmenu
attribute.description: Specifies the context menu for an element

attribute.name: dir
attribute.description: Specifies the text direction for the content in an element

attribute.name: draggable
attribute.description: Specifies whether or not a user is allowed to drag an element

attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Specifies a unique id for an element

attribute.name: irrelevant
attribute.description: Specifies whether or not a element is irrelevant. An irrelevant element is not displayed

attribute.name: lang
attribute.description: Specifies a language code for the content in an element. Language code reference

attribute.name: ref
attribute.description: Specifies a reference to another document / another part of a document (use only if the template attribute is set)

attribute.name: registrationmark
attribute.description: Specifies a registration mark for an element

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Specifies an inline style for an element

attribute.name: tabindex
attribute.description: Specifies the tab order of an element

attribute.name: template
attribute.description: Specifies a reference to another document / another part of the document that should be applied to an element

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: Specifies extra information about an element

attribute.name: onabort
attribute.description: Script to be run on an abort event

attribute.name: onbeforeonload
attribute.description: Script to be run before an element is loaded

attribute.name: onblur
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element loses focus

attribute.name: onchange
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element changes

attribute.name: onclick
attribute.description: Script to be run on a mouse click

attribute.name: oncontextmenu
attribute.description: Script to be run when a context menu is triggered

attribute.name: ondblclick
attribute.description: Script to be run on a mouse double-click

attribute.name: ondrag
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element is dragged

attribute.name: ondragend
attribute.description: Script to be run at the end of a drag operation

attribute.name: ondragenter
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element has been dragged to a valid drop target

attribute.name: ondragleave
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element leaves a valid drop target

attribute.name: ondragover
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element is being dragged over a valid drop target

attribute.name: ondragstart
attribute.description: Script to be run at the start of a drag operation

attribute.name: ondrop
attribute.description: Script to be run when dragged element is being dropped

attribute.name: onerror
attribute.description: Script to be run when an error occurs during the loading of an element

attribute.name: onfocus
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element gets focus

attribute.name: onkeydown
attribute.description: Script to be run when a key is pressed

attribute.name: onkeypress
attribute.description: Script to be run when a key is pressed and released

attribute.name: onkeyup
attribute.description: Script to be run when a key is released

attribute.name: onload
attribute.description: Script to be run when a document loads

attribute.name: onmessage
attribute.description: Script to be run when a message event is being triggered

attribute.name: onmousedown
attribute.description: Script to be run when a mouse button is pressed

attribute.name: onmousemove
attribute.description: Script to be run when the mouse pointer moves

attribute.name: onmouseover
attribute.description: Script to be run when the mouse pointer moves over an element

attribute.name: onmouseout
attribute.description: Script to be run when the mouse pointer moves out of an element

attribute.name: onmouseup
attribute.description: Script to be run when a mouse button is released

attribute.name: onmousewheel
attribute.description: Script to be run when the mouse wheel is being rotated

attribute.name: onresize
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element is being resized

attribute.name: onscroll
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element's scrollbar is scrolled

attribute.name: onselect
attribute.description: Script to be run when an element is selected

attribute.name: onsubmit
attribute.description: Script to be run when a form is submitted

attribute.name: onunload
attribute.description: Script to be run when a document unloads
